name: U M B R E L L A
name_original: U M B R E L L A
description:
Tested only with Oculus Rift.

Controls: Left Thumbstick for teleport. Right Thumbstick for rotate-step. A for uh-huh. X for whatever. Other buttons and triggers maybe for other stuff. It'll tell you or you can figure it out. It's not rocket farming.

There's lots of talking in this game that you can't skip. Cool, huh? The game is mostly you listening to talking. If that's your idea of fun, you're welcome.

There is VR stuff. But the middle of the game, where are the game type stuff is supposed to happen-- that's the part I didn't finish. So you get a nice meaty beginning with lots of exposition, a weird and small middle, and then all of the sudden it's over and you're in a VR sandbox with a toilet. You heard me.

Features to be added later:

  • A colloqualizer: Emits a random for-sure human colloqualism
  • Physics-based and absurdity-based tests that require your only operable tool: the umbrella.

Features that will not be improved:

  • The voice acting. You gotta problem with that!? Yeah, me too.
